beans.description: To use the Simulated Area detector in dummy mode: 1) Launch the Utilities > GDA SWMR AreaDetector Simulation on the local machine and start the IOC. 2) If you want to use an Area detector on another machine, or you are also launching the GDA servers, export the WORKSTATION environment variable with the short name for the machine the Simulation IOC is running on.
